name: Skinseoul Lab
description: Operator of a tech-driven e-commerce startup addressing global skincare market challenges through advanced AI and data-driven solutions while collecting and matching public information such as product trends, pricing, ingredient insights, and consumer reviews across multiple platforms to enhance its offerings.
one_liner: Operator of a tech-driven e-commerce startup addressing global skincare market challenges through advanced AI and data-driven solutions while collecting and matching public information such as product trends, pricing, ingredient insights, and consumer reviews across multiple platforms to enhance its offerings.
